citations.narrative:
There are no records of the offspring born in 2025. This includes seven fallow deer (5-M, 2-F) born in 2025, and two white
tail deer fawns born in 2025. All of the adults are included on the inventory, however the offspring are missing from the
record keeping.
The lack of updated birth records do not allow for proper management and traceability of the regulated animals.
Complete records must be kept by the facility. The records shall include any offspring born of any animal while in his or
her possession or under his or her control.
To be corrected by: January 15, 2026
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There are no records of the offspring born in 2025. This includes seven fallow deer (5-M, 2-F) born in 2025, and two white 
tail deer fawns born in 2025. All of the adults are included on the inventory, however the offspring are missing from the 
record keeping. 
 
The lack of updated birth records do not allow for proper management and traceability of the regulated animals. 
 
Complete records must be kept by the facility. The records shall include any offspring born of any animal while in his or 
her possession or under his or her control. 
 
To be corrected by: January 15, 2026 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
